domains.isUsedBySocialShoppingTooltip: This domain is assigned to a Social Shopping sales channel. Please remove the domain from the sales channel before you delete it.

introduction.description: In order to display products on an Instagram business page, you will have to establish an Instagram Business Account, first. Everything else is explained in the step by step guide below.
introduction.title: How to: Setup and connection

facebook.stepByStep:
• Create an account at Facebook
  • Create a business account at business.facebook.com
  • Navigate to the catalogue manager
  • Add a new catalogue for your Shop
  • Configuration of the catalogue: Select product in information for the data feed
  • Switch to data source
  • Add products
  • Select data feed
  • Configure the data feed. Copy and paste the data feed URL (below)

introduction.description: This Sales Channel generates an XML feed that you can use on Google to automatically synchronise products into your catalog. To do this, you have to deposit the feed URL on Google and define how often Google should download the feed. Everything else is explained in the step by step guide below
introduction.title: How to: Setup and connection

google-shopping.stepByStep:
• Open the Google Merchant Center
  • Create a new feed in Products > Feeds
  • Choose a country and a language
  • Name your feed and choose "scheduled fetches"
  • Name your feed file and paste the export URL (below)
  • After that, open the feed and click "fetch now"

introduction.description: In order to display products on a facebook business page, you will have to establish a facebook business account first. Everything else is explained in the step by step guide below.
introduction.title: How to: Setup and connection

instagram.stepByStep:
• Create a business account at business.facebook.com
  • Navigate to the catalogue manager
  • Add a new catalogue for your shop
  • Configuration of the catalogue: Select product in information for the data feed
  • Switch to data source
  • Add products
  • Select data feed
  • Configure the data feed. Copy and paste the data feed URL (below)
  • If needed, create an Instagram account
  • Open your Instagram settings and click "Switch to profesional profile" and select "Business"
  • Follow the instructions to connect you facebook Sales Channels

introduction.description: This Sales Channel generates meta data, that allows you to display your products as a pin on Pinterest. You can find more information about this topic in the step by step guide below.
introduction.title: How to: Setup and connection

pinterest.stepByStep:
• Click "Validate on Pinterest"
  • Log in or create an account on Pinterest
  • Enter any product URL from the storefront and click on "Validate"

base.intervalHelpText: The interval is limited by the run interval of the scheduled task "ProductExportGenerateTask". This is set by default to once per day.
base.noDynamicProductGroupFound: You need to create a dynamic product group in order to use the Social Shopping Sales Channel. Please create a dynamic product group.

facebook.description: Sell products on a Facebook page

facebook.helpTextGoogleProductDefaultCategory: Facebook uses the Google product category ID to categorise its products. Please enter the Google product category to be used if no Google product category has been set for the product category.

validation.google-product-category-missing: This product is associated to a category without google product category
validation.noErrorsFound: All products have been validated without errors on {validationDate}
validation.notValidatedYet: The products have not been validated yet. Please start the validation to see if all products are valid.
validation.validationRunning: The validation is currently running. The log will update automatically. Please wait for the validation to finish.
validation.validationShowedErrors: The last validation resulted in errors. Please check and correct the errors below and restart the validation. Last validation: {validationDate}
